testcase.description:
Test adding a product bundle to the cart from quickview and product detail pages.
# Setup
- open the session - search for possible products - open quickview
# Scope
- add to cart from quickview - verify cart - remove product from cart - go to product and add to cart from product detail page - verify cart
testcase.codecomment: Search for Mario to get a standart product
Go to QV of the first Game

## Cart
Validate Add 2 Cart from QV and PDP and check if the same product is added - First add a product from QV and verify that the QV will be set to inviseble after clicking add to cart - validate if all bundle products are shown in the cart - Second add product from PDP and verify if the same product in cart is shown - validate if all bundle products are shown in the cart
Store the names of every bundle product Caution: The product should have at least 5 elements
